name: The Cat in the Room
description:
You wake up to find an old friend staring at you once again. A friend so deceptively comforting in its familiarity. You can't help but listen to what it has to say and do as it tells you while it takes you on a journey you've never made before.

Made for the 37th GMC Jam in 96 hours.

Credits: dosto, Reaktori, Riuku.
